data.name: Release 1.3.0
data.body:
![](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/syt2/zotero-addons/1.3.0/total?label=downloads)

- Add columns for plugin release date and plugin version information.
- Support column pref, including right-click customization and persistent column pref.
- Enable/disable plugins support.
- Use LargePrefHelper for storing large amounts of data.
- Remove the ability to sort by multiple columns; only single-column sorting is supported.
- Update the jsdelivr URL
- Implement case-insensitive sorting for names
